channel.title: Source Themes on Georgia Papadogeorgou
channel.description: Recent content in Source Themes on Georgia Papadogeorgou

item.title: Low Levels of Air Pollution and Health: Effect Estimates, Methodological Challenges, and Future Directions
item.description: A review of the literature on the health effects of exposure to low levels of particulate matter.

item.title: Discussion of 'Penalized Spline of Propensity Methods for Treatment Comparison'
item.description: Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software. Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature. Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: A Causal Exposure Response Function with Local Adjustment for Confounding: A study of the health effects of long-term exposure to low levels of fine particulate matter
item.description: Causal exposure-response curve estimation with local confonding adjustment. Different variables confound the exposure-response relationship at different exposure levels.

item.title: Causal inference with interfering units for cluster and population level treatment allocation programs
item.description: Causal inference with interference for realistic treatment allocation programs. Evaluating the comparitive effectiveness of power plant emission reduction strategies for reducing ambient ozone concentrations.

item.title: Adjusting for unmeasured spatial confounding with distance adjusted propensity score matching
item.description: Incorporating geographical distance in a propensity score matching approach to account for unmeasured confounding by spatial variables.
